item.title: 美联储库克强调对降息采取 "谨慎 "态度的必要性
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）表示，美国央行必须对降息采取谨慎态度，以便留出更多时间让部分经济领域的通胀放缓。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook said the US central bank must take a cautious approach to cutting interest rates to allow more time for inflation to slow down in some segments of the economy.】

item.title: 激进投资者 Politan 寻求 Masimo 增加两个董事会席位
item.description: 波利坦资本管理公司（Politan Capital Management）正寻求在 Masimo 公司董事会中增加两个席位，这是该公司多年来第二次参加代理权争夺战。【原文：Politan Capital Management is seeking two more seats on the board of Masimo Corp., marking its second proxy battle at the health-care technology company in as many years.】

item.title: 宏利为 43 亿美元保单达成再保险协议
item.description: 宏利金融公司（Manulife Financial Corp.）达成了另一项交易，同意与加拿大 RGA 人寿再保险公司（RGA Life Reinsurance Co. of Canada）就 58 亿加元（43 亿美元）的加拿大保单进行再保险，以剥离部分盈利能力较差的资产。【原文：Manulife Financial Corp. has struck another deal to offload some of its less-profitable assets, agreeing to reinsure C$5.8 billion ($4.3 billion) of Canadian policies with RGA Life Reinsurance Co. of Canada.】

item.title: 菲斯科与汽车制造商的谈判结束，破产风险上升
item.description: 陷入困境的电动汽车初创企业菲斯科公司（Fisker Inc.【原文：Struggling electric vehicle startup Fisker Inc. said in a regulatory filing that talks with a major automaker about an investment were terminated without a deal, which means the company needs to renegotiate terms for recent financing or face the possibility of filing for bankruptcy protection.】

item.title: 通胀降温，美联储主席古尔斯比预计今年将降息三次
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他是预计今年将降息三次的决策者之一。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said he is among policymakers anticipating three interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 光速公司首席执行官达西尔瓦表示公司对私有化持 "开放 "态度
item.description: 加拿大光速商务公司（Lightspeed Commerce Inc.）的负责人告诉蒙特利尔一家新闻媒体，最近有关支付公司 Nuvei Corp. 可能被私募股权收购的谈判让他思考自己的公司是否也应该这样做。【原文：The head of Canada’s Lightspeed Commerce Inc. told a Montreal news outlet that recent talks about a potential private equity buyout of payments firm Nuvei Corp. have him thinking about whether his company should do the same.】

item.title: 赞比亚与债券持有人达成协议，在长达数年的争论中取得关键胜利
item.description: 赞比亚已同意重组 30 亿美元的欧元债券，扫清了拖延其三年之久的摆脱债务违约的关键障碍，这对其他寻求债权人交易的国家也有影响。【原文：Zambia has agreed to restructure $3 billion in eurobonds, clearing a key hurdle that’s delayed its three-year effort to escape debt default with implications for other nations seeking creditor deals.】

item.title: 中国总理表示，中国为实现 2024 年目标开了个好头
item.description: 李强总理表示，自 2024 年伊始，中国经济复苏态势持续向好，这凸显了中国政府在接待一系列高规格访客时为树立信心所做的努力。【原文：China’s economic recovery has been improving since the start of 2024, Premier Li Qiang said, underscoring the government’s effort to project confidence as it hosts a slew of high-profile visitors.】

item.title: 最新出售后英国不再拥有 NatWest 的控股权
item.description: 英国政府不再被视为 NatWest Group Plc 的控股股东，因为它将继续加速退出这家在金融危机中救助过的贷款机构。【原文：The UK government is no longer considered a controlling shareholder in NatWest Group Plc as it continues to hasten its exit from the lender it rescued in the financial crisis.】

item.title: 穆迪认为债务谈判可促进增长，赞比亚债券上涨
item.description: 随着赞比亚努力完成拖延已久的债务重组，该国的美元债券走强，穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）称，该协议将成为更广泛经济改革的催化剂。【原文：Zambia’s dollar bonds strengthened as the country worked to finalize a long-delayed debt restructuring, with Moody’s Investors Service saying a deal would be a catalyst for broader economic reforms.】

item.title: 伊格尔资本首次涉足 ETF 领域，基金规模达 18 亿美元
item.description: 鹰资本管理公司（Eagle Capital Management）斥资 18 亿美元进入价值 9 万亿美元的 ETF 行业。【原文：Eagle Capital Management is making a $1.8 billion entrance into the $9 trillion ETF industry.】

item.title: 尽管房价下跌，伦敦住宅价格仍是收入的 12 倍
item.description: 在过去五年中，伦敦房产的可负担性在英格兰得到了最大程度的改善，但与收入相比，其价格仍然高得令人瞠目。【原文：Properties in London saw the biggest improvement in affordability in England over the last five years but still remain eye-wateringly expensive compared to earnings.】

item.title: 加纳中央银行将利率维持在 29% 不变
item.description: 加纳银行维持基准利率不变，理由是通胀上行风险不大。【原文：The Bank of Ghana left its benchmark interest rate unchanged, citing modest upside risks to inflation.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的 ETF 基金通过共同基金翻转突破 10 亿美元
item.description: 由于摩根士丹利首次进行了共同基金转换，该公司的交易所交易产品阵容目前持有超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s exchange-traded lineup now holds more than $1 billion thanks to the firm’s first-ever mutual-fund conversions.】

item.title: 人工智能会计初创公司 FundGuard 募集 1 亿美元新资金
item.description: FundGuard 是一家为资产管理公司提供基于云的人工智能会计平台的初创公司，该公司已筹集到 1 亿美元的新资金，其中包括来自全球大型投资公司的资金。【原文：FundGuard, a startup that provides a cloud-based, artificial intelligence-powered accounting platform for asset managers, has raised $100 million in new funding, including from major global investment firms.】

item.title: 联合利华首席执行官暗示荷兰可能赢得冰淇淋上市争夺战
item.description: 联合利华首席执行官表示，阿姆斯特丹可能会击败伦敦，成为联合利华冰淇淋业务部门的上市地点，该公司的市值可能达到 170 亿欧元（约合 184 亿美元）。【原文：Amsterdam may beat London to a potential €17 billion ($18.4 billion) listing of Unilever Plc’s ice cream unit, according to its chief executive.】

item.title: 拖欠率高达 60% 给巴西金融科技公司带来麻烦
item.description: 巴西的金融科技公司正受到向客户提供的贷款违约潮的冲击，而巴西的大型传统银行却不愿碰这些贷款，这导致资产支持信贷市场的风险层崩溃。【原文：Brazilian fintechs are getting hit by a wave of defaults on loans they made to customers that the nation’s bigger, legacy banks wouldn’t touch, causing risky layers of an asset-backed credit market to collapse.】

item.title: 英国最后一家飞机制造商获得私募股权投资救命稻草
item.description: 布里顿-诺曼获得了一家私募股权公司的新投资，一个月前，这家英国最后一家独立飞机制造商表示将在财务不确定时期聘请管理人。【原文：Britten-Norman secured new investment from a private equity firm, a month after the last independent British aircraft manufacturer said it would hire administrators during a period of financial uncertainty.】

item.title: Intrum 债权人出现分歧，其中一个集团选择 Weil 进行债务谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Intrum AB 的债券持有人曾考虑联手与这家瑞典公司进行债务谈判，但由于投资者持有的票据到期日不同，他们的利益也各不相同，因此他们分成了不同的小组。【原文：Bondholders of Intrum AB who considered teaming up for debt talks with the Swedish company have split into different groups given the varied interests of the investors depending on the maturities of the notes they hold, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 财政部长称兹罗提和波兰债券对迫在眉睫的央行官员调查保持冷静
item.description: 波兰财政部长表示，面对对央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）迫在眉睫的调查，波兰金融市场保持了平静。【原文：Poland’s financial markets have remained calm in the face of a looming probe into central bank Governor Adam Glapinski, according to the country’s finance minister.】

item.title: 据说三星在 IPO 停滞三年后重启出售谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，三星运输公司（Tristar Transport）再次尝试出售自己，因为这家中东物流公司的投资者希望从该公司最近收入激增中套现。【原文：Tristar Transport has revived attempts to sell itself as investors in the Middle East logistics firm seek to cash in on the company’s recent revenue surge, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 可可比铜还贵，价格突破 9000 美元
item.description: 可可价格继续飙升，有史以来首次突破每吨 9,000 美元。【原文：Cocoa extended its surge — surpassing $9,000 a ton for the first time ever — as a supply crunch grips the market and chocolate makers grapple for beans.】

item.title: 苹果、谷歌和 Meta 遭欧盟调查，测试新数字法律
item.description: 苹果公司、Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司和 Meta Platforms 公司面临着可能被处以巨额罚款的风险，因为欧盟正在全面调查这些公司是否遵守了约束大型科技公司权力的严格的新法律。【原文：Apple Inc., Alphabet Inc.’s Google and Meta Platforms Inc. face the risk of potentially hefty fines as the European Union opened a full-blown investigation into the firms’ compliance with strict new laws reining in the power of Big Tech.】

item.title: 天然气需求回升，中石油利润飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于天然气需求的回升帮助这家中国能源巨头抵消了油价下跌的影响，中国石油天然气股份有限公司（PetroChina Co.【原文：PetroChina Co.’s annual profits rose to a record as a rebound in natural gas demand helped the Chinese energy major offset the impact of falling oil prices.】
